name: migrateStore(from:type:options:mapping:to:type:options:)
desc: Migrates the source store to the destination using the specified mapping model.
declaration: func migrateStore(from sourceURL: URL, type sourceType: NSPersistentStore.StoreType, options sourceOptions: [AnyHashable : Any]? = nil, mapping: NSMappingModel, to destinationURL: URL, type destinationType: NSPersistentStore.StoreType, options destinationOptions: [AnyHashable : Any]? = nil) throws
